The Cleaner+.effect: Adds total bonuses on foe to damage dealt during combat. After combat, if unit attacked, inflicts Def/Res-7 on target and foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.

Thunderhead.effect: Adds total bonuses on unit to damage dealt.

Thökk.effect: Calculates damage from staff like other weapons. At start of turn, if foe's HP ≤ unit's HP+3 and foe is in cardinal direction and uses bow, dagger, magic, or staff, foe cannot move more than 1 space through its action.

Tomato Tome.effect: Grants Atk/Spd+1 to allies within 2 spaces during combat.

Tomato Tome+.effect: Grants Atk/Spd+1 to allies within 2 spaces during combat.

Tyrfing.effect: If unit's HP ≤ 50%, grants Def+4 during combat.

Urvan.effect: Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). If unit receives consecutive attacks, reduces damage from foe's second attack onward by 80%.

Urðr.effect: If Sing or Dance is used, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+3 to target.

Valflame.effect: At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Res-4 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

Vassal's Blade.effect: Accelerates Special trigger (cooldown count-1). If unit's Spd > foe's Spd, boosts damage dealt by 70% of difference between stats. (Maximum bonus of +7 damage. Combos with Phantom Spd.)

Vidofnir.effect: If foe initiates combat and uses sword, lance, or axe, grants Def+7 during combat.

Wargod's Tome.effect: At start of turn, inflicts Atk/Res-4 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

Warrior Princess.effect: Effective against flying and armored foes. Grants Spd+3. Grants Atk+3 to allies within 2 spaces during combat.

Water Breath.effect: If foe initiates combat, grants Def/Res+4 during combat. If foe's Range = 2, calculates damage using thel ower of foe's Def or Res.

Water Breath+.effect: If foe initiates combat, grants Def/Res+4 during combat. If foe's Range = 2, calculates damage using thel ower of foe's Def or Res.

Weirding Tome.effect: Grants Spd+3. At start of turn, inflicts Spd-5 on foes in cardinal directions with Res < unit's Res through their next actions.

Wind's Brand.effect: At start of turn, inflicts Atk-7 on foe on the enemy team with the highest Atk through its next action.

Wing Sword.effect: Effective against cavalry and armored foes.

Wo Dao.effect: Grants +10 to damage when Special triggers.

Wo Dao+.effect: Grants +10 to damage when Special triggers.

Yato.effect: If unit initiates combat, grants Spd+4 during combat.
